name: Draggable-google-modal
tagline: Simple draggable modal with pure Javascript, inspired by Google Modal.
body:
___

### Features

* Without external dependencies.
* Drag and Drop
  * When is fixed, the drag is disabled.
* Responsive
* Shortcuts
  * Ctrl + **Up** Arrow: Fill the entire screen;
  * Ctrl + **Down** Arrow: Exit full screen;
  * Ctrl + **Left** Arrow: Align the left, filling half the screen*;
  * Ctrl + **Right** Arrow: Align the right, filling half the screen*;



___

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this project? Check out our [http://www.marcelodolce.com/](http://www.marcelodolce.com/) or send me an email, [dolcemarcelo@gmail.com](mailto:dolcemarcelo@gmail.com).
